summary: Experienced professional with a legal background and a demonstrated history of promoting government and business interests worldwide. Skilled in international relations, economic diplomacy, CSR, trade and investment promotion, EU affairs and project management in a wide variety of business sectors, including energy, the maritime industry and transport & logistics.

education.degree_name: Master of Laws (LL.M.) in Dutch Law
education.field_of_study: Masters in both international and civil law

profile_positions.description: In this position I am coordinating the Eastern Europe team, which is responsible for supporting Dutch business in Eastern Europe through economic diplomacy, trade and investment promotion (including trade missions to established and new markets and financial instruments) and promoting international CSR standards. Within the International Enterprise Department I am also responsible for promoting Dutch business interests in the energy sector worldwide and first point of contact for Dutch companies and business associations in this sector. Key focus areas within the energy sector include oil and gas and renewable energy, particularly offshore wind energy, bio-energy, solar pv, e-mobility and hydrogen.
profile_positions.title: Policy Coordinator at International Enterprise Department

profile_positions.description: In this position I worked with the economic team at the Netherlands Embassy in Bangkok, promoting Dutch business in Thailand and the region. Key tasks included economic diplomacy (e.g. promoting Dutch economic interests), trade and investment promotion (e.g. trade missions, market intelligence) and promoting international CSR standards. Main focus areas: energy (including offshore), water (maritime industry), transport & logistics, the medical sector and creative industries.
profile_positions.title: First Secretary (Political and Economic Affairs) at Nethetlands Embassy in Bangkok

profile_positions.description: In this position I worked with the economic team at the Netherlands Embassy in Hanoi, promoting Dutch business in Vietnam and the region. Key tasks included economic diplomacy (e.g. promoting Dutch economic interests), trade and investment promotion (e.g. trade missions, market intelligence) and promoting international CSR standards. Main focus areas: energy (including offshore), water (maritime industry), transport & logistics and the medical sector.
profile_positions.title: First Secretary Economic & Commercial Affairs at the Netherlands Embassy in Hanoi (Vietnam)

profile_positions.description: During this secondment I coordinated the Netherlands position at EU Energy Councils at ministerial level. In addition, I coördinated the position of the Ministry of Economic Affairs on new EU Commission proposals and on topics discussed at EU Coreper level (Comite des Representants Permanents). I was also advisor to the Deputy Secretary-General of the Ministry of Economic Affairs on topics discussed at the Management Council.
profile_positions.title: Coordinator Energy Councils (Office for European Affairs), seconded at Ministry of Economic Affairs

profile_positions.description: As a policy officer on Afghanistan I provided strategic advice on the Netherlands position and activities in Afghanistan during the deployment of Dutch troops and police forces in the country.
profile_positions.title: Policy officer Afghanistan

profile_positions.description: In this position I focused on political relations with several countries in Southeast Asia (Singapore, Malaysia, Brunei and the Philippines) as well as the Asia Europe Meeting (a forum for Asian-European political dialogue).
profile_positions.title: Policy Officer Southeast Asia

profile_positions.description: As the Deputy Head of this Section, I provided legal advice on a wide variety of issues regarding international treaties on privileges and immunities and on seat agreements with international organizations based in the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Deputy Head Foreign Missions, Privileges and Immunities Section (Protocol Department)
